examples.text: Fakat bunu düşünürken yalnız o adamların dışlarına bakarız
examples.translation: But when we think about this, we only look at the outside of those men.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish دوشنمك, دوشونمك (düşünmek), from Proto-Turkic *tüĺ-ün- (“to think, understand”). Cognate with Uyghur چۈشەنمەك (chüshenmek, “to understand”), Uzbek tushunmoq (“to understand”), and Kazakh түсіну (tüsınu, “to understand”).
